acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Jakir Hussain is produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 03-02-2018.Copy prepared. Deliver the same to the accused person.

Accused Zakir Hussain is from custody. After hearing both sides and perusing relevant materials charge u/s 366 (A) IPC R/W sec. 6 of the POCSO Act, 1212 is framed against the accused and same is read over and explained to him to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried.Issue summon to PWs. Accused is remanded to custody till 17-02-18.Heard both sides on bail petition (Petn no. 155/18) moved on behalf of the accused Zakir Hussain. Perused the case record. Considering the length of detention accused Zakir Hussain is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 25,000/- with two sureties of the like amount I/D to custody.

Accused is present. One PW Anowar Hussain is present. Two PWs are absent. Cause shown vide petition no. 681/18 which is allowed. Seen petition no. 693/18 filed by ld. Spl P.P. seeking time for examination of the PW (Informant) as the seized school certificate (Original) is require to be exhibited by the informant. Which is in his custody.Petition is allowed. PW (Informant) is directed to appear on the next date alongwith the original school transfer certificate which he has taken on zimma.
Accused is absent with step vide petition no. 1407/18. Prayer is allowed. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused is present. No PW has turned up. Issue summon to Pws.
Accused is absent with step vide petition no. 2543/2018. Prayer is allowed. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused is present. PWs are absent. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused is absent with step vide petition no. 742/2019. Prayer is allowed. No PW has turned up. Issue summon to PWs.

Accused is present. PWs absent. Summon issued to PW. Anuwar Hussain has duly been served. He has not appeared. Issue bailable W.A. of Rs. 500/- against him with direction to bring School Certificate of Victim. Also summon other PWs. Fixing 01-08-2019 for Evidence.

Accused is absent with steps vide petition No. 2100/2019. Prayer is allowed. PW namely Hazarat Ali is absent with steps vide petition No. 2101/2019. Prayer is allowed. PW Anuwar Hussain is present. Ld. Special P.P. filed a petition vide petition No. 2091/2019 praying for another date with a direction  to the informant Anuwar Hussain to bring the original school certificate of victim of the time of his deposition. Prayer is allowed. Issue summon to informant and other PWs. Fixing on 23-10-2019 for Evidence.

Accused is absent with step vide petition No. 2856/2019. Prayer is allowed. PW Hazarat Ali is absent without any step. Issue bailable WA of Rs. 300/- against him. Also issued summon to informant and other PWs. Fix 21-01-20 for Evidence.

Accused is absent vide petition no. 175/20. Prayer is allowed.PW Hazarat Ali is present.Vide petition no. 175/20 learned  Junior defence counsel prays  for  another date for evidence. Prayer is allowed.PW Hazarat Ali is allowed  to go back with direction to appear  on next date.Fix- 25.03.20 for evidence.
